item.title: So i've been trying to spawn items on ground
item.dc:creator: @Whaitas Whaitas
item.description:
@Whaitas wrote:

i made the code in itemhandler which is
}
public void createglobalitems() {
createglobalitem(5420, 2642, 4718, 1);
createglobalitem(5420, 2642, 4712, 1);
createglobalitem(5420, 2640, 4708, 1);
createglobalitem(5420, 2644, 4710, 1);
createglobalitem(5420, 2632, 4709, 1);
createglobalitem(1965, 2631, 4713, 1);
createglobalitem(1965, 2632, 4713, 1);
createglobalitem(1965, 2631, 4714, 1);
createglobalitem(1965, 2631, 4716, 1);
createglobalitem(1965, 2633, 4717, 1);
}
i dont even know in which line should i paste theese?
i placed it at the very end.
and this is what happens :
